title: 求翻译
author: Aikini
txt_content:
怀疑人生了，作者好几个单词拼错，还有几个词写错位置
有一段不会翻译，虽然懂意思，但是连不起来啊感觉，连起来一句话就读不通了。。。。
Shows how to get to a shop that is in the same world as the player  options:
    create-edite-with-chat:
      name: "&aUse the chat to create/edite shops: %option%"
      lore: 
        - "&bIf enabled you will create/edite"
        - "&bshops with the chat, if not you will"
        - "&bcreate/edite shops with an iventory"
    use-chat:
      name: "&aUse the chat to buy/sell: %option%"
      lore:
        - "&bIf enabled you will buy/sell"
        - "&bwith the chat, if not you will"
        - "&bbuy/sell with an iventory"
    limit-to-player-stock:
      name: "&aLimit to your stock: %option%"
      lore:
        - "&bIf enabled when buying/selling with the menu"
        - "&byou won't be able to select more items"
        - "&bthat you can sell or that fit in your inventory"
    limit-to-player-can-pay:
      name: "&aLimit to the amount you can pay: %option%"
      lore:
        - "&bIf enabled when buying with the"
        - "&bmenu you won't be able to select"
        - "&bmore items that you can pay"


我咋感觉我接下来会在问答区刷屏的样子

replies.author: cc7w
replies.txt_content:
展示（演示？看语境）怎样到达和玩家在同一世界的商店

下面是配置文件吧
选项
在聊天栏中创建或编辑商店 edite - edit iventory - inventory
在聊天栏中购买或出售物品
玩家买卖货品的上限
玩家买卖金额的上限
